text: Alberto Puello Calderón (born 22 July 1994) is a Dominican professional boxer who has held the WBA interim super-lightweight title since 2019. ==Professional career== Puello compiled a record of 16-0 before facing and defeating fellow countryman Jonathan Alonso, to win the interim WBA Super lightweight title. ==Professional boxing record== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:95%" |- !
